articles.title: Recruits react to Virginia Tech hiring James Franklin as its next head coach - 247Sports
articles.description: Virginia Tech has named James Franklin its next head football coach From all accounts this looks like a massive win for the Hokies and a major upgrade for the program on and off the field Here is the recruit reaction to the news
articles.content:

articles.title: Elon Musk Calls Jeff Bezos ‘Copycat’ For Reported Launch Of $6.2 Billion AI Startup - Forbes
articles.description: Scientist Vik Bajaj, who previously worked at Google X, the tech giant’s secretive research arm, will serve as co-CEO of the new company.
